abilities.name: Daemonic Poisons
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase and the Fight phase, after this model has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the battle, that enemy unit is poisoned. At the start of each playerâ€™s Command phase, roll one D6 for each poisoned enemy unit on the battlefield: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
